ComicInfo.Title: Homefront, Part 3 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary: CHOOSE YOUR PATH! You become DUKE, leader of the G.I. JOE team, as he begins his journey to become a Real American Hero! You make the life or death decisions! Or-is Duke just being tortured horrifically at the hands of the Baroness, and this is way of dealing with it-a never-ending branching series of "Might Have Beens?" Or... is it both?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 13:57:56. [CVDB399013]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Allen Martinez, Juan Doe, Kito Young, Ryan Dunlavey, Steve Kurth
ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness, Cover Girl, Doc, Dr. Mindbender, Duke, General Colton, Hashtag, Intruder, Major Bludd, Quick-Kick, Roadblock, Shipwreck, Tunnel Rat
ComicInfo.Locations: Fort Jay, Long Island, Missouri, New York State, North Carolina, Ohio
